import React from 'react' import im from "./p9.png" import './Favourite.css' import { CloudUploadFill,X, ChatDots,PencilSquare} from 'bootstrap-icons-react'; import { Trash} from 'bootstrap-icons-react'; import {ImCross} from 'react-icons/im' const Comment = ({author,postedOn,comment,url}) => { return (

{author}

posted at {postedOn}

{comment}

{/*
*/}
X
) } export default Comment
